title: Altair: Incorrectly requesting sync committee duties prior to fork activation
body:
### Description
With a minimal configuration and `ALTAIR_FORK_SLOT: 8`, the chain starts correctly with no exceptions but at slot 8 we start getting exceptions because the validator client is attempting to load sync committee duties for epoch 0 which is prior to the Altair fork:

